predicate.note: Frames file for 'cause' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus and comparison with 'make' and 'force'

roleset.name: impelled action

example.name: NP impelled action
example.text: Even brief exposures to crocidolite causes symptoms that show up decades later.
example.arg: symptoms that show up decades later.

example.name: SBAR impelled action
example.text: The filing on the details of the spinoff caused Cray Research stock to jump $2.875 yesterday.
example.arg: The filing on the details of the spinoff
Cray Research stock to jump $2.875 yesterday.

roleset.note: This differs from the impelled-action of "force" because the impelled agent cannot be "peeled out" and fronted through passivization.
